path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/DEFINE Token Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Potential violation of Checks-Effects-Interaction pattern
findings.description: Could potentially lead to re-entrancy vulnerability.

findings.title: Use of block.timestamp can be influenced by miners
findings.description: The use of block.timestamp can be influenced by miners to a certain degree, allowing them to change the outcome of a transaction in the mined block.

findings.title: Inconsistent coding style
findings.description: Deviations from the Solidity Style Guide were identified throughout the entire codebase. Taking into consideration how much value a consistent coding style adds to the project’s readability, enforcing a standard coding style with the help of linter tools such as Solhint is recommended.

findings.title: Missing Range Check for Input Variable
findings.description: The function updateGasForProcessing(uint256) does not check if the input variable 'newValue' is within a valid range, which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Typos
findings.description: Throughout the Define’s codebase, there are a few typos in the code and in the comments.
